===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Eula)
:{{A|vo card eula invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Eula:''' You want to go against me? Fine, challenge accepted.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.

:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)

{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Eula)
:{{A|vo card eula invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Eula:''' If you lose to me... then for once, you'll be bearing a grudge, hahaha.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Eula's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card eula ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Eula:''' I'll get you back...

;(When the player defeats two of Eula's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card eula ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Eula:''' How humiliating...

;(When Eula defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card eula ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Eula:''' I'll be taking this.

;(When Eula uses an Elemental Burst)

;(If the player loses the match)

;(If the player wins the match)

{{Dialogue End}}

===Guest Challenge===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Eula)
:{{A|vo card eula freetalk 01.ogg}} '''Eula:''' Hmm... Maybe I should implement some of our scout strategies...

;(If the player wins the match)

{{Dialogue End}}
